news.headline: Apple (AAPL) Stock Rated Hold as HSBC Flags AI Letdown and Tariff Risks
news.summary: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is one of the AI Stocks on Analysts’ Radar Right Now. On July 18, HSBC maintained a “Hold” rating on the stock with a $220 price target. news.headline: Google Earnings Roundly Beat Estimates. Growing CapEx Remains an Issue.
news.summary: Google-parent  Alphabet  beat expectations for its second quarter earnings results Wednesday afternoon. news.headline: Apple beats US appeal claiming it shortchanged customers on iCloud storage
news.summary: (Reuters) -A U.S. federal appeals court on Wednesday rejected claims by Apple customers that the iPhone maker gave them less iCloud data storage than they paid for when upgrading.
